Description.Text: Located in Cannaregio, Eurostars Residenza Cannaregio Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Venice. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. To be found at the hotel are casino, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes Eurostars Residenza Cannaregio Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Venice.
Located in Cannaregio, Eurostars Residenza Cannaregio Hotel is a perfect starting point from which t

Message.Text:
Kids conditions up to 12 years olD: From 0 to 2 years Old Free at baby cot froM 2 to 12 years old Sleeping with parents without extra bed, freen without breakfast. Second child sharing extra bed with the first child, free in only room. / Condizioni Bambini fino a 12 anni: Da 0 a 2 anni - free in culla Da 2 a 12 anni Condividendo senza letto extra con i genitori, free in solo alloggiamento.

Groups: for bookings with 3 rooms or more, the hotel will apply different conconditions and supplements. / Grupos: a las reservas de 3 habitaciones o m s, el hotel aplicar  diferentes condiciones y suplementos / Gruppi: alle prenotazioni di oltre 3 camere la struttura potrebbe applicare differenti condizioni.

IN CASE OF NOS HOW, HOTEL RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHARGE THE TOTAL AMONT OF THE STAY / EN EL CASO DE NO SHOW EL HOTEL SE RESERVA EL DERECHO DE HACER EL CARGO TOTAL DE LA RESERVA / NEL CASO DI NO SHOW, L'HOTEL SI RISERVA IL DIRITTO DI ADDEBITARE L'INTERO IMPORTO DEL SOGGIORNO.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
